EmailTemplate.name: Notify HR After PreOnboarding Completion
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus : Pre-onboarding Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear HR,
{!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_First_Name__c} {!EMS_EM_Onboarding_Request__c.EMS_EM_Last_Name__c}, whose joining date is [date of joining], has completed the pre-onboarding process in the candidate portal. Please find the details provided by clicking on the following link: Applicant Record
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
